ComicInfo.Summary:
Guest starring Dale Keown's THE PITT!
While a doctor discovers a secret about an old Maxx acquaintance, Maxx and Julie take a trip to the Outback together.. where they discover, among other things-The Pitt! And while Maxx and Pitt defend themselves in the outback, they shift into miniature versions of themselves in Julie's apartment, fighting off a GIANT ISZ... who threatens to devour them!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Sam Kieth (a) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Sam Kieth (a) & Ronda Pattison (c) | 2 |
